sections.heading: Mayor; remission of fines; pardons
sections.text: The mayor of a city of the primary class shall have the power to remit fines and forfeitures and to grant reprieves and pardons for all offenses arising under the ordinances of the city.SourceLaws 1901, c. 16, ยง 29, p. 79;R.S.1913, ยง 4492;C.S.1922, ยง 3878;C.S.1929,
